sources.title: Lost City of the Jungle (1946) 13-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 13-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Russell Hayden, Jane Adams, Lionel Atwill
Directors: Lewis D. Collins & Ray Taylor

Following the end of WWII, warmonger Sir Eric Hazarias sets off to the mythical city of Pendrang to search for Meteorium 245, the only practical defense against the atomic bomb.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00      PizzaFLIX Intro
01:06     CHAPTER 1:  Himalaya Horror
27:38     CHAPTER 2:  The Death Flood
47:50     CHAPTER 3:  Wave Length for Doom
1:06:59  CHAPTER 4:  The Pit of Pendrang
1:26:05  CHAPTER 5:  Fiery Danger
1:43:35  CHAPTER 6:  Death's Shining Face
2:03:25  CHAPTER 7:  Speedboat Missing
2:20:59  CHAPTER 8:  Fire Jet Torture
2:39:29  CHAPTER 9:  Zalabar Death Watch
2:56:40  CHAPTER 10: Booby Trap Rendezvous
3:12:34  CHAPTER 11: Pendrang Guillotine
3:29:09  CHAPTER 12: Jungle Smash-up
3:46:08  CHAPTER 13: Atomic Vengeance
4:03:11 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: A new radioactive element is found that is a defense against the atomic bomb. Warmongers go to Pendrang as archaeologists, but they are searching in secret for the element. The United Peace Foundation has an agent following the warmongers to Pendrang.
metadata.Writer: Joseph F. Poland, Paul Huston, Tom Gibson
metadata.Actors: Russell Hayden, Jane Adams, Lionel Atwill
